trans-unit.source: The files are available for download in the front end.
By default, only the front-end users that are registered for an event can download that event's files. This setting can be changed in the configuration.
This is the number of registrations for which no registration records in TYPO3 exist.
Still, these registrations will reduce the number of vacancies, for example if the registrations have been received offline via a phone call.
